original_title: Remembering Irma: Voices of St. Martin
overview: Irma was the strongest hurricane on record to exist in the open Atlantic region, hitting the Caribbean Island of St Martin on September 6, 2017. This short documentary looks back on the aftermath of this devastating day, and through the words of local islanders, offers a hopeful vision for the future.
title: Remembering Irma: Voices of St. Martin
